Camel Arab Theme | Lime Chat

CamelCommunity for LimeChat, based on Camel_Arab Theme

Ignoring unimportant stuff like join, part and quit messages.

Installation

To install, simply copy (or symlink) the two files Camel_arab.css and Camel_arab.yaml into ~/Library/Application\ Support/LimeChat/Themes/
